page.title: 03Transport(A1)
page.content: {Safety of:} On June 5th. 1985 we analysed the safety of the A1 as it passed through Great Ponton. We noticed that the road was very busy and noisy.The road surface is reasonably good in this area.The traffic is travelling very quickly through the village most of it nearing the speed limit of 70 m.p.h. Particularly dangerous aspects of the road here is that there are no crash barriers between the carriageways .In addition there are several right lane exits in this area, where cars slow down and could cause an accident in doing so. Attitudes to the A1 vary among the residents of Great Ponton.Many think it is very dangerous others believe it is convenient for quick travel to towns North and South.
